In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,
